text: 9.15: Jo 3.29Kamavahu Jisas ambami, Kru mumɨŋga navundi urɨrɨm andɨndi. Kamata nuŋandɨ kru mɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga kɨyɨhihi nuŋambirɨm indarɨhu mavɨndɨhi maŋirɨhandu. Kɨyɨhandata kru muŋɨnɨŋ kru kandɨhamaŋ tɨmbuta muvu undu. Kamatɨhu nuŋandɨ kru mɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ nɨŋambirɨm indarɨhu mavɨndɨhi ñaña itɨhañandu.
